headline: Total Economic Impact™ Study Finds Organizations Achieved 176% ROI With Dayforce
summary: Independent research highlights $6.8 million net present value of Dayforce™ investment and payback in under six monthsMINNEAPOLIS and TORONTO, Feb. 17, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dayforce, Inc., a global human capital management (HCM) leader that makes work life better, today announced the results of a new Forrester Consulting Total Economic Impact™ (TEI) study that quantifies the financial and operational benefits organizations can realize by implementing Dayforce.
